item.title: Under Patel, FBI heightens focus on violent crime, illegal immigration. Other threats abound, too
item.description: The FBI under the leadership of Director Kash Patel has made fighting violent crime and illegal immigration top priorities

item.title: A New Orleans police officer who fatally shot a puppy will face a jury lawsuit trial
item.description: A New Orleans police officer who shot and killed a puppy is being sued by the dogâ€™s owners in federal court

item.title: As the UN Ocean Conference opens in France, a push to turn promises into protection
item.description: The U.N. Ocean Conference is opening in France as pressure mounts to turn promises into action on protecting the ocean

item.title: New disputes emerge ahead of US-China trade talks in London
item.description: U.S.-China trade talks in London this week are expected to take up a series of disputes that have buffeted relations

item.title: At least 2 people killed as storms push through South
item.description: Two people were killed by falling trees as a line of severe storms pushed through the South over the weekend
